doc.title: House Wife Bangers Vol. 4
doc.plot: There is nothing more enjoyable than meeting a happily married couple, only to extort sex from the sexy wifey. It's really quite simple: Find a douche bag husband that likes to gamble, do drugs, or simply sit around like a lazy piece of shit. Then tell them the rent is due and they will pay dearly if this debt is not squared up. Next thing you know wifey's naked and our cock is tickling her tonsils. Damn. I love marriage
